mapper.select: SELECT DeliveryCompanyID AS ID, WeekDay ,CAST( MAX(IF(Seq = 1, StartTime, '')) AS CHAR(5)) AS startTime1 ,CAST( MAX(IF(Seq = 1, EndTime, '')) AS CHAR(5)) AS endTime1 ,CAST( MAX(IF(Seq = 2, StartTime, '')) AS CHAR(5)) AS startTime2 ,CAST( MAX(IF(Seq = 2, EndTime, '')) AS CHAR(5)) AS endTime2 FROM delivery_open_hour WHERE DeliveryCompanyID = #{id} GROUP BY DeliveryCompanyID, WeekDay ORDER BY WeekDay
